message.text: Welcome to #name. JOIN DISCORD, Invite Link In The Server Title.
Join our discord READ the TOURIST BOOTH channel... or get stuck and die places often.
HAVING PROBLEMS OPENING DOORS?? Close the game, visit MODS tab in default launcher, right click ZELADOR mod, select REPAIR - No More Problem!
Keep getting sick and dying? We use terje mods, Learn more at: https://tinyurl.com/terje-wiki
SOME BUNKERS can become TRAPS join discord, read the tourist booth.
You Require a Map in inventory to see the map (PRESS M), and a compass in inventory to see 3D markers (PRESS K). Pew Pew Pew!
We welcome any feedback, please use discord tickets!
Test Player Role requires 3 months Of active ticket submissions.
All applications for any form of staff or team members begin by applying for Whitelisted role
Keep our community fun healthy. No toxic interactions.
This map is a WORK IN PROGRESS (WIP) Complain at your own risk! LUL...
Be your most entertaining and apocalyptic self, but please do not be toxic!
Heading into the NB Series BUNKERS? You may need a team. Enter at your own risk!
Thank you for helping improve our map! We do Hope you are enjoying your time here with us!
PLEASE DO NOT litter or Loot Cycle. Put it in a fire if you don't want it, or just leave it where it spawned in.
Thanks for being part of Zelador! ~ DeGrinchy
Not sure what to do? Check our Discord: https://discord.gg/DWXTaEXyUe read the Touris Booth!
Issues with door interaction? Close the game, visit MODS tab in default launcher, right click ZELADOR mod, select REPAIR!
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/DWXTaEXyUe
BUNKERs may require a team. Enter at your own risk!
Zelador v0.4 Play Test Server open to all dayz players.
Submitting tickets or using ZELADOR in your VOD title will help me with map developments, thank you! ~ DeGrinchy
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/DWXTaEXyUe
Interested in a Test Player Role? U need 3 months Whitelisted, and actively submit no less than 5 tickets/issues in a month.
NOTICE: #name restarting in #tmin minutes or less.
